channel.title: About on Jeong-Gyu Kim
channel.description: Recent content in About on Jeong-Gyu Kim

item.title: About
item.description: About Me Welcome! I am a EACOA Postdoctoral Fellow at Korea Astronomy and Space Science Institute, Daejeon, Republic of Korea. Combining theory and numerical simulations, my researh focuses on understanding how star formation proceeds in giant molecular clouds in the interstellar medium; how stellar feedback from massive stars (radiation, stellar winds, and supernovae) interacts with the surrounding interstellar medium and subsequently affects the lifecycle of giant molecular clouds and star formation cycle in galactic gas disks.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Email: jeonggyu dot astro at gmail dot com Location: Lee Wonchul Hall, 3rd floor, room 308 Mailing Address Dr. Jeong-Gyu Kim Theoretical Astronomy Department Korea Astronomy and Space Science Institute, 776, Daedeokdae-ro, Yuseong-gu, Daejeon, 34055 Republic of Korea
